First one is you're her Neighbor. You chat with her in the mornings and evenings. Sometimes, you even went on outings, where you either helped her shop or went out to eat with her. Once in awhile, you helped her out with one of her fortune-telling business.

Sometimes, you encountered her while she was feeling pretty down after one of her many attempts at trying to win Sonic's heart. Those times, she was either a big soft-serve ice cream eater or was in desperate need of a hug.

You sometimes swore that when she looked at you, she was either imagining you with either a blue hair or with your hair dyed blue.

You feared what might happen the day when she gave up on Sonic... which was sooner than you might think. Can you deal with Amy turning her full affections towards you? Or will you deal with the Piko-Piko hammer-wielding twice-scorned woman?
15131.title: Amy Rose plotpaths

choices: On Amy's twitter, she was wondering if she should give up on Sonic
Amy came into your home, almost ready to cry
Amy skipped into your home, happy to eat ice cream
151311.content:
After shopping for food, you were climbing the stairs to your apartment, when you heard an all-too-familiar huffing.

Looking behind you. you saw Amy, back from one of her attempts to win Sonic's heart. She looked a bit scruffy and ready to lie back in a comfy chair for a few hours.

"Hey, Amy. How was everything?" You asked.

"Eugh... Tried to give Sonic a fortune-telling in hopes that'll convince him to date me, but Eggman appeared and kept throwing his Eggpawns. Then he unleashed a couple of burnerbots, but one of them had some sort of icethrower," Amy explained. She sighed, "It was a complete bust. Sonic ran off after Eggman and I needed to collect my arcane cards."

"Well, I picked up some ice cream," you replied as you held up a bag of ice cream.

"It's not soft-serve, but I'm not feeling picky," Amy said with a smile so sweet, you momentarily wished you were dating her. She then looked at herself, still dirty from the fight. Amy groaned. "Can you wait a minute? I need to clean myself up."

"Take your time," You replied. She gave you another smile before she ran up to her room, accidentally giving you a glimpse under her dress.

After you entered your apartment, you set the ice cream and a few bowls on the table. You then began to put away your groceries. As you waited, you decided to check your smartphone, since you and Amy were following each other online.
151311.title: Amy's neighbor : Start!

choices: "Try dating you, since you're so nice..."
"Date you for a little bit, see if it makes Sonic jealous."
1513113.content:
Taking out your phone, you checked her Twitter and Instagram for any changes. The recent news for both was her announcing she was going to give Sonic his fortune and her finding him.

"Huh... You muttered, hoping for some news. When the door opened, you put away your phone.

"I'm ready for Ice Cream!" Amy said in a sing-song tone as she skipped into your home. She either cleaned up her red dress really fast or put on a new one.

"Ah, I didn't expect you to be so fast. My bad," You said, making Amy giggle.

"It's alright. I haven't decided if I wanted toppings or not," Amy said as you began to take out a carton or two. "any chocolate?"

Yes to both ice cream and topping," You said as you took out the syrup.

"Yay!" Amy cooed as she clapped her hands as she sat down.

After making a couple of bowls of ice cream for you and Amy, you sat down at the table.

After a few minutes of eating in silence, you asked, "So, Amy... Are you free tomorrow?"

Amy paused before she asked, "Are you asking me out?"

"Maybe.... I don't know... I'm just worried you might be getting a bit depressed or something with all the Eggman attacks and Sonic's regrets," You nervous answered.

Amy was silent for a few moments, her smile replaced with a small frown. When she spoke, she said, "I guess I have been feeling a little down. Heh... You really have a good eye for being able to notice. Maybe... Maybe I should..."
1513113.title: Amy's neighbor : Happy for ice creme, sad inside

15132.content:
“click click click” the mechanical sound of keys rang out through the office space as Michael’s grey eyes scanned the document in front of him, while it was a simple legal document it was important nonetheless. Groaning and stretching to relieve his tired muscles he was about to return to the document when “tap tap” someone tapped him on the shoulder.

“Hey workaholic” turning to face the voice Michael came face to face with Evan, his co-worker and friend. Evan unlike Michael was adored in a more casual outfit rather than business-wear. Michael’s white shirt with black dress pants, polished shoes and a suit jacket was a stark comparison to Evan’s much more casual outfit of long-sleeved black shirt and matching black jeans, a pair of sneakers adorning his feet.

“Was there something you needed Evan?” Michael asked, his voice while friendly held a hint of annoyance, while it was true he could be called a workaholic it was only because he held a certain standard to his work, one which sadly few people in his department wished to maintain, as demonstrated by his friend’s choice of attire.

“Yeah, your shift ended 15 minutes ago Mr. brown-nose” Evan replied smugly. Glancing down at his desktop’s Michael found that it was indeed 5:15. Chuckling slightly in embarrassment Michael quickly saved and closed the document he had been working on before grabbing his suit jacket from his chair and slipping it on.

“Thanks Evan, I owe you one, I might like working here more than someone like you, but I don’t like giving any more time than I need to, same as everyone else” Michael said clapping the man on the shoulder.

“Ohhh, so does this mean we can finally go get a beer together? Maybe check out a few girls and if the night goes well…” Evan let the sentence trail off but Michael knew his friend’s implications all too well. Evan couldn’t exactly be called a womanizer, to be one of those you had to actually have success with a woman, but Evan was the most “appreciative” man in terms of the female form Michael had ever met.

“Pfft, I don’t need alcohol to have a good time, and I’ve got no interest in going bar crawling, nor picking up some random woman who’s too drunk to realise what we did last night” Michael replied.

“…Seriously man I know it’s rude to ask but are you gay or what? You turn me down every time I ask to go drinking” Evan replied, his eyes narrowing as he looked Michael up and down like he was trying to find some distinct characteristic.

“Nah I just have a head on my shoulders, that and I don’t want to end up in jail because some chick regretted her actions the night before, you want to risk that be my guest, but I’m heading home” Michael replied. Pausing for a moment Michael quickly opened and reached into the middle drawer of his desk, his key card in his hand as it exited the desk. “See you on Monday Evan” Michael stated as he turned and walked towards the elevator.

“See you on Monday Michael” Evan replied as a sigh exited his lips although as he walked away Michael was sure he heard his friend mutter “wreck my fun, only losers go drink out on their own…” the rest fading from his hearing as he exited the office his department used and made it out into the main hallway.

Humming to himself Michael walked briskly to the end of the hall ‘alright, I have plenty of time to get to the bus…and I’m 15 minutes late’ Breaking into a sprint he skipped the elevator as they were only a few floors up and bursting into the staircase catapulted himself down 3 stairs at a time. Rushing past the building’s secretary he sprinted down the street, his bus coming into sight as he rounded the corner. Watching it start to pull away, he began to wave and holler like an idiot hoping to catch the attention of someone on the bus. He was sure someone saw him as the bus driver turned to face his direction, then turned back and the bus pulled out into traffic. Michael was sure he felt a vein pop out of his head, due to the way the city’s transit system worked there wouldn’t be another bus for a full hour.

‘Guess I’m walking home’ he muttered to himself, while it wasn’t a mile trek or anything, it would still take a good 20-30 minutes to walk home. Sighing in defeat he began his trek as block after block of pavement passed under his feet, he tuned out all but the most important features around him, the traffic lights he needed to keep focus on and the sounds of traffic, just in case some idiot driver decided a pedestrian wasn’t worth the few extra seconds of waiting.

Slowly the cityscape began to change, buildings beginning to spread out as he moved from the city proper to the suburbs, grass appearing beside him instead of concrete as the buildings eventually stopped all-together as he walked past a children’s park. The park being made up of a large expanse of grass for kids to run around and play in, a sandbox area with some jungle-gym equipment, a swing set and see-saw as well as a few benches scattered around so parents could watch over their kids, this late at night the place was completely deserted.

“WAHHHHH!!!” The shrill piercing scream came out of nowhere, Michael although he wouldn’t admit it jumped several feet into the air, his head whipping to where the sound was coming from. Of course it was coming from the park, but that wasn’t right, as far as he could tell the place was empty, everyone having heading home to eat. Yet he could still hear the sound of crying, from the pitch he had to assume it was a young kid probably female. Looking around he couldn’t help but sigh ‘this better not bite me in the ass’ he muttered before taking off for the playground at a light jog. Spending a few minutes searching Michael finally found the little girl in one of the play-structure's tunnels, what surprised him was the fact the little girl was a Mobian as he could count the number he'd seen in person on one hand.

Her outfit was ordinary enough, a bright orange dress with a blue tie, orange and yellow shoes and white gloves, aright the gloves were a bit strange. She was a little lop-eared rabbit girl. Orange fur covered her eyes, the tips of her ears and streaked down the back of her head starting at her forehead. The rest of her head and ears were covered in cream-coloured fur except for around her mouth and small brown nose. Looking down at her legs and arms he honestly couldn’t tell if they were simply covered in a very fine fur or she had skin but he wasn’t going to touch to find out.

She seemed to not have noticed him so as gently as he could he coughed into his hand, the little girl’s ears and head swiveling to face him revealing her tear-stained cheek and reddened eyes. “Hey there…I” he never got a chance to finish the sentence as she suddenly leapt towards him latching onto his chest.

“I…I lost my mommy” she wailed pitifully, her breaths coming in small hiccups as her fingers dug into the fabric of his jacket leaving him at a loss for words or what to do. The obvious thing would be to hug this little girl, tell her everything was going to be okay, but from the sound of her voice she couldn’t be any older than 8 years old and considering whoever took care of her was probably freaking out right now, he really didn’t want to do anything that might be “taken out of context” and used against him.

As she kept crying, tears streaming down her face he knew it was cruel not to provide some comfort, his hand gently falling on top of her head as he began to gently pet her. “It’ll be alright, we’ll find your mom” he said as soothingly as possible, and much to his surprise she stopped crying, after a few last sniffles anyways. Gently crawling out of the tunnel he felt her grip his hand tightly as if the little girl expected to lose him too, shrugging to himself as it’d make keeping an eye on her easier he knelt down to look her in the eye.

“I haven’t asked yet but what’s your name? I’m Michael” he stated, knowing this was the easiest way he’d get her to cooperate.

“I-I’m Cream” she replied, it was definitely a different name but he’d certainly heard worse.

“Cream, do you know where you live?” Michael asked. A wordless point was all he got in reply, thankfully it was towards his suburb rather than the city, his suburb was do-able, trying to find her mom in the city would have been next to impossible. “Alright, just hold onto my hand and I’ll take you home, although I might need you to help me a little alright?”

“O-ok” she replied, whether the nervousness came from realizing she might be in trouble or the fact that he wasn’t someone she knew well was unclear to him.

They set off in silence which continued until they actually started to have houses passing on either side Cream speaking up and giving vague yet helpful directions like “turn left” which Michael would usually have to have clarified by her pointing where she wanted them to go. What surprised him was how well-behaved Cream was, she didn’t tug, shout, or pull she simply led him to the best of her ability. After ten minutes and travelling several blocks the two reached a cul-de-sac, Cream getting slightly antsy. Smiling Michael gently pushed her forward Cream running to the house on the exact opposite end of the street.

Jogging to catch up Michael just heard the sound of a ringing doorbell, by the time he reached the door he heard the sound of heels on tile for a moment before the door was yanked open revealing a rabbit woman who looked just like Cream except for a few differences, her ears were longer and thinner, rather than orange markings a single tuft or orange fur sat on top of her head and she wore a lavender dress with a crimson vest covering it.

“Mommy!” Cream shouted as she raced forward, the woman quickly scooping her daughter up, tears on the edge of both mother and daughter’s eyes as they embraced.
15132.title: Vanilla the Rabbit

151321.content:
After a few moments of standing there Michael couldn’t help but feel a bit awkward as mother and daughter embraced, despite finding Cream and delivering her home he wasn’t meant to be part of their moment.

“I’m so sorry Cream, I should have made sure you were right beside me for leaving” Cream’s mother whispered as she cradled her close.

“I-I should have come out when you called” Cream replied sniffling slightly as she buried her head in her mother’s shoulder.

‘Ok, good deed done for the day” Michael thought before turning to leave. He was surprised when he felt a strong grip on his arm; looking back he noticed one of Cream’s mother’s slender gloved hands wrapped tightly around his wrist.

“Won’t you stay for dinner? It’s the least we could offer” Her voice despite being pained moments before was now soft, gentle and warm. Maybe it was the fact that both mother and daughter had turned to face him, tears threatening to tumble down their cheeks at the slightest agitation but he couldn’t say no.

“Sure, if you’ll have me” Michael replied, smiling softly Cream’s mother gently lowered her to the floor and nudged down the hall “go get washed up for dinner” she said softly, Cream running off to obey.

Standing up Cream’s mother led Michael through an archway into the home’s living room and presumably the kitchen. “So, I don’t think I’ve gotten your name?” Michael asked as it felt a bit strange referring her as only Cream’s mother.

“Oh, I’m Vanilla, it’s a pleasure to meet an upstanding young man like yourself” she replied a small smile gracing her lips. Michael couldn’t help but blush at the compliment; turning away he focused his attention on the living room. A large black sofa sitting next to the wall they had entered from, a large white brick fireplace taking up the entire wall opposite the archway with a large bay window taking up the western wall, an entryway on the eastern wall presumably leading to the kitchen, a large plasma screen TV in the north-eastern corner of the room caught his attention as they didn’t seem like a TV family. Looking to the beige walls he saw nearly every space that would have been open on the walls was taken up by picture after picture, all of them happy times between Vanilla and Cream, playing together, swimming, simply cuddled up together, yet there was one major element missing from the picture, a male rabbit, or a male of any Mobian species for that matter.

Knowing not to step on that landmine Michael silently followed into the kitchen, a gentle gesture from Vanilla pointing him to the table. Sitting down he couldn’t do much but watch as Vanilla set about preparing dinner, rummaging around in the fridge she pulled out lettuce, carrots, tomatoes, celery as well as some buns, butter, and a large carton of juice. Not the most fancy meal but it would certainly suffice. Walking over to a black granite counter Vanilla pulled out a cutting board and began to cut up the salad ingredients. Not having much else to do he watched Vanilla for a few moments, her movements surprisingly quick and precise as she sliced the produce into smaller and finer bits.

“You don’t see many mobians on Earth” Michael spoke up during a lull in her cutting, worried that he’d cause Vanilla to cut herself if he spoke while she was concentrating. “Most still stay on Mobius despite the fact you have humans over there as well, I know Dr.Robotnik was a human, but we’re not all bad are we?” He asked, while he knew it was a touchy subject he could count the number of Mobians he’d seen on one hand and while it seemed like humans and mobians got along there was always this tension in the air.

“…Most mobians like to stay on Mobius, it is our home planet after all, as for anything to do with Dr.Robotonik, I don’t think anyone holds your kind responsible for his actions” Vanilla’s eyes stayed focused on the carrots she was currently cutting, so Michael wasn’t entirely sure if what she was saying was true.

“So, why’d you come to Earth then?” The question left his lips before he’d really given it much thought, while he was certainly curious it was probably a private matter. “Actually…”

“You were looking at the pictures on the walls, so I’m sure you noticed someone was missing from all those pictures” Flinching Michael braced for impact as he’d done exactly what he’d planned not to do “Cream’s father wasn’t the…nicest of men, he wanted nothing to do with Cream so I wanted nothing to do with him. We moved here and I’ve raised her alone ever since” Michael relaxed, that wasn’t as bad as he’d been expecting, he expected some cartoon or drama level event this was a bit more grounded than he had expected.

“Well you’ve done an excellent job raising her on your own” Vanilla didn’t stop cutting but Michael was sure he saw Vanilla’s ears physically swivel to face him. “She’s a wonderful little girl, polite, obedient, calm….a little too trusting I’ll be honest but that’s a relatively minor fault. All in all you’ve been a wonderful mother, you should be proud.” Vanilla physically froze for a moment before quickly finishing cutting up the ingredients and sweeping them into a bowl.

“That’s very kind of you to say” she replied her back facing him as she tossed the salad, grabbed some plates and turning back to the table began to set it. Michael couldn’t help but notice that there were tears on the edge of Vanilla’s vision.

“Vanilla I’m sorry I…” He was silenced by one finger gently pressed against his lips.

“All I’ve ever cared about is being a good mother to my little Cream, and you told me I’ve raised her to be a wonderful little girl, I’m happy” she stated softly before sitting down. “Cream, dinner” Vanilla called Michael preparing for Cream to come barrelling into the kitchen but when she arrived she simply walked in, a strange blue creature no bigger than a doll with a blue body, and yellow arms, legs, and the top of its head floating in after her.

“Cheese this is Mr. Michael, he’s the man who saved me” Cream said as he and Cheese made eye contact. He was about to correct Cream on the fact his last name wasn’t actually Michael when “glomp” Cheese was suddenly wrapped around his face.

“Chao chao chao.” Freeing his face Michael glanced over to Vanilla, her gaze directing him to Cream for some sort of explanation or translation.

“Cheese says thank you for helping me get home, and that you’re a very nice man” A small smile graced her features as he handed Cheese over to Cream, the little bunny surprising him again as she jumped up into his lap, her fur tickling his chin as she sat with her back pressed against his stomach.

“Ummmm, I..." Michael was at a bit of a loss for words, Vanilla was sitting right across the table and Cream had just sat herself down in his lap, that of a total stranger…ok so that trust was more of an issue than he first thought.

“Cream’s a bit too young to fit in the seats, she needs either a book to act as a boost or someone’s lap” Michael could see a small grin on her lips as well as hear it in her voice “while Cream is a very trusting little girl she’s never taken to anyone this quickly” she stated.

Looking mortified as she seemed to realize what she had done Cream’s whole body deflated, her ears drooping down as she looked up towards him “I-I’m sorry, I just thought I could sit in your lap” she said, a gentle quiver in her voice tugging at Michael’s heartstrings.

Sighing internally Michael gently stroked Cream’s ears “it’s alright with me if it’s alright with Vanilla” he replied turning the tides if slightly back on her. A simple nod earned a happy squeal from Cream as she got comfortable in his lap, he pulled his chair in so Cream could actually reach the table and leaning over her he grabbed some salad and 2 of the buns and the 3 of them began to eat.

The 3…4 of them if you were counting Cheese who’d grabbed himself a bun were silent for several minutes as they ate, the only sound being that of cutlery and the quiet chewing of food. “Cream you and your mother went to the park to play today, is there anything else you like to do?” Michael asked.

Michael missed the small smirk on Vanilla’s face as Cream turned to face him “I like to pick flowers for mom, watch TV, colour, play with Cheese, and read” she stated proudly earning a small grin from Vanilla and from Michael as well.

“Well how about we read or colour after dinner then?” Michael replied, rubbing Cream’s head earing a giggle from the little bunny.

“That would be lovely, it’s very kind of you to play with Cream” Vanilla spoke up earning a dismissive wave from Michael.

“Yay thank you Mr.Michael” He couldn’t help but grin as the little bunny wrapped her arms around his chest.

“It’s no problem Cream, now let’s get back to eating” He replied. Looking up at Vanilla he noticed she was staring at him, a gentle smile on her face as her eyes guided his vision down. Glancing down he found that he was gently petting Cream’s head with his free hand, a gentle hum escaping the little bunny as she enjoyed the attention. Glancing back up to Vanilla she giggled softly before returning her attention to her meal.

After several minutes of silent eating Michael felt a tap on his arm “Mr. Michael I’m full” Cream stated her legs swinging off the edge of the chair as she waited for him to let her leave.

Glancing at Vanilla for permission she softly nodded telling Michael Cream could be excused. “Go play Cream, Vanilla and I will clean up the dishes and then I’ll read to you ok?”

“Alright, thank you Mr. Michael” Cream surprised him by standing up and gently kissing him on the cheek before hopping off the chair and racing off to play.
151321.title: Meeting bunnies and having Dinner

choices: Some other plotline with Rouge the Bat
151331.content:
Alright, I'm the kind of guy who likes to have alternate ways one can fall in love/lust with a character.

This storyline is one where the Main character is a guard at a museum. They helped put a large gem in a podium. However, the gem is magic and the Mc wants to be in a relationship. During the moving incident, they accidentally cut themselves on the Gem, making it ready to grant the guard's wish.

So when Rouge goes to steal the Gem, the gem uses its power to make her fall in love with the guard.
151331.title: Rouge the Bat.

choices: You had a night shift and she found you.
She learned where you live from the computers
1513311.content:
You are a human security guard named Will. You recently got a job at a museum. You worked mostly during the day, but occasionally the night shift when someone called in or when a new exhibit was being put in.

One such exhibit was the Heart of Venus. It was a large heart-shaped gem that had its own glow. When you helped put it into an enclosed exhibit, you somehow cut your hand on the gem, despite it not having any sharp edges.

Afterwards, you went to lunch. As you ate, you let your mind wander, idly making a wish to have someone love you.

Unknown to you, the Heart of Venus was magical. Your blood was all the price it needed to grant your wish. It waited for someone to touch it to grant your wish.

After a day or two, a certain gem thief learned about the Gem and decided to make it hers. On a whim, she had a fake of it crafted. It lacked the innate glow and wouldn't stand up to a close inspection.

In a disguise, she scoped out the museum and learned the best spots to sneak in.

So came the night that Rouge snuck in.

Keeping to the ceiling and other spots above both eyesight and cameras, she thought, 'This museum pretty basic stuff. Bet they didn't think I'd come by and steal a heart-shaped gem. Come on! my favorite clothes have a heart motif! ...Then again, the only interesting thing this place has is the Heart of Venus.'


Eventually Rouge got to the spot where the Heart of Venus was. With an evil smile, Rouge waited until the guards left the area. She put little devices on the Cameras to have them repeat footage. Then, she glided down, carefully opened the exhibit, and switched the Heart of Venus with the fake.

After getting back above the average line of sight, Rouge removed the little devices on the cameras and headed for the roof. Once there, Rouge looked at her newest acquisition.

"Well, Well. A heart worth billions. almost like me. Let mama give you a kiss before I go back and put you in my personal museum," Rouge muttered before she kissed the heart. The Heart of Venus glowed, adding in a love for you to her. she had no idea what your name was, but she knew what you looked like and wanted you. After putting the Heart of Venus in a large pouch, Rouge went back inside to find out where you were.
1513311.title: Rouge and the museum guard.

choices: You make it to the museum in one piece.
Your car wont start. Somebody tampered with it!
15133112.content:
Rouge kept in the shadows once again avoiding the cameras and hidden alarm triggers searching for this mysterious boy she suddenly felt a desire for. She didnt know who this boy was she desired nor why she desired him to begin yet she didnt care. She loved mysteries and it's hard to turn down trying to solve the mystery of the man you love yet never met.
Sadly, the security guard (she somehow knew the boy was a security guard as well) was nowhere to be seen. Guess he wasnt on shift. Not wanting to leave empty-handed (not counting the Heart of Venus), she had a Plan B. After hacking the cameras with old repeated footage, Rouge searched through one of the computers in the museum's database for employee info. It didnt take long for her to find the name of the mystery man she admired as well as his age, hobbies, interests, family, and most importantly his address. With that information in her possession, what she needed to do now is plan for the right moment to strike...

................…

Morning came. You woke up groggy and achy cuz you had loads of trouble sleeping last night. It didnt help that the AC in your apartment was out cuz the landlord forgot to get it fixed, so you woke up in a burning hot and sweaty mess to boot!

Needless to say it was a crap morning. You hated everybody and everything at the moment. You felt like giving the middle finger to every single person you come across today. Even your cat who thankfully didnt understand the gesture.

Not soon after forcing down your pent up anger with some cereal, your smart phone went off blaring System of A Down at high volume!
After your ears stopped ringing you took a look at the Caller ID. It was your boss, the museum's chief of security, Mr. Huntersen! You immediately answer it.

“Hello Mr. Huntersen!” you announce like youre up with the chickens!
“Newbie, we got a situation!” there was urgency in his gruff stern cold voice.
“What is it, Chief?” you said on full alert.

“The Heart of Venus is missing! Someone snuck in and stole it!” The Heart of Venus?! The freshly new exhibit?! STOLEN?!

“Who stole it?!” you asked.
“Dont know,” Mr. Huntersen answered, “someone messed with the cameras. By the time we reset them, it was already gone. Not only that, someone also pried into the database. Damned if I know what they did there.”

You lowered the phone and muttered an 'Oh shit' under your breath. You hadnt even worked there more than a month and already shit went down!

“That aint all,” Mr. Huntersen continued, “just talked with the Director. His uh, biggest investor… the one who donated the Heart of Venus to the museum found out and she's pretty pissed.”
“Well, that sucks.”
“Even worse… turns out the investor happens to be the President's daughter.”

You spit out your coffee after hearing that news despite not drinking coffee to begin with! Doubting what your ears may have heard, you needed to clarify.
“President's daughter...” you squint your eyes, “...as in THE President's daughter? As in the President of the United State's daughter?”
“Yep,” he clarified, “Big Daddy's darling little brat, Sara.” Well crap. If there was any person with a major rank you didnt wanna piss off, it was the daughter of one of the very few remaining leaders of the free world! You wont be surprised if the museum decides to fire the entire security staff just to save face! This will look good on a reference. And just when it looked like you were finally making good money too…

“I know your shift doesnt start until later this afternoon, newbie,” Mr. Huntersen states, “but you might wanna get your ass over here ASAP before all the media hawks show up. And bring a set of earplugs. I heard Sara's screams can rupture eardrums.”
“I'm on my way, Chief!” *click*

DAMN IT ALL! How could the museum's security team screw up THIS royally bad?! It's gonna be nightmarish once it's all over the news. But it's not like it's YOUR fault! YOU werent on shift when it happened! They cant blame you for incompetence! You werent there!

Nonetheless, you finished your bowl of cereal, dash into your room for a quick change of clothes, rush out the door, quickly groan irritated at the notice on the door from your landlord that there's gonna be a last minute scheduled power outage tonight, and rush to your car.

You take a deep breath and put the keys into the ignition...
15133112.title: Mourning the Morning

151331121.content:
From a distance, a Rouge dressed in a trenchcoat and fedora watched you head towards a small group of cars. She disabled the one that looked like it had cost a good amount of money. She smiled as you neared it and…

You entered the lousy one besides it and drove off.

She blinked a few times before shaking her head. The gem thief then headed to her motorcycle and drove off, intending on keeping an eye on you.

====

You had managed to arrive some time before the president’s daughter arrived.

“May I see the spot where the heart of venus was stolen?” you asked your boss.

“Sure. I’ll come along with to tell you what I know,” your boss answered.

When the two of you arrived, you saw that there was a crime scene set up. For a moment, you thought a mistaken had been made, as it looked like the heart of Venus was still there. But you saw that the exhibit was a glass fake, as the real one was made of precious gems.

“We have no idea who could have done this,” your boss answered as Rogue appeared within a small group of G.U.N. Guards,securing the area for Sara.

“I have one theory…” you muttered. Your boss looked at you, making you say, “Rouge the gem thief.”

‘Either he’s smart or paranoid. Either way, I’m touched that not only I’m on his mind, but he’s right on the money,’ Rouge thought.

“That’s what I thought too, but according to G.U.N., they have proof that she was training in their gym while we were burgled,” your boss answered.

“What kind of proof?” you asked.

“Computer and video. I asked if they had anyone who saw her or trained with her, but they said any agent who used to train with her stopped because she kicks way too hard,’” your boss answered.

“Computers and video can be faked. Last night was proof of the latter,” You replied in annoyed tone.

Rouge smirked as she thought, ‘My, how brilliant he is. I wonder if we should play cat-and-mouse?’

Before your boss could say any more, the door slammed open, getting everyone’s attention.

Sara strode in, looking quite annoyed. For a cat girl, you thought she looked kinda cute, but you weren’t too fond of the Tsundere feel she gave off. Mostly because your job was on the line.

“I allowed this… this… low cost Museum… to hold onto the most beautiful item I had in my entire life. and you allowed it... TO! BE! STOLEN!” Sarah yelled, stomping her feet with each extremely loud word.

It was only thanks to your training that you did not flinch. Rouge narrowed her eyes at the screaming cat-girl.

“Get me the entire security staff of this place!” Sara yelled, snapping her fingers.

You quickly fell into place with your fellow security guards who rushed in. Sara began to walk back and forth in front of you.

“Which one of you was guarding this room? Which one of you was watching this spot from the security room?” Sara loudly asked, roughly poking any guard as she passed by. “Which of you thought that fake glass thing was my donation?”

When she stepped in front of you, something happened to the real Heart of Venus in Rouge’s secret Gem hiding spot. It glowed like before.

Sara’s eyes glowed. Her furious expression turned to a playful smirk. She looked around before she said, “You know what? I think I can forgive this place if this guard can show me around town for the day.”

Whatever annoyance Rouge had towards Sara was now hate. She thought, ‘No one steals from me. I steal from them!’

Sara then faced away from you and backed herself into you, making sure that you definitely felt her body.

“Hey! Back off away him!” Rouge yelled as she stomped towards you.

A blonde cop said, “Yeah, He might very well be the thief or an accomplice!”

“Who are you two?” Sara asked with a glare.

You’d move, but one of your fellow guard mouthed ‘Get her mad and us fired. You’re dead’

“Officer Topaz, Sir,” The blonde cop answered with a salute. “I work with Rouge, and she is a special agent of G.U.N.”

Sara glared at the two before she asked one of her secret service guards, “Was he here last night?”

“No, Ma’am,” The Secret Service guard answered. “I’d advise you to step away from him.”

Sara looked disappointed as she stepped away from you.

“Sara, I have a suggestion,” Rouge said, getting the cat girl’s attention. “Let me interrogate him for a day. I have expert knowledge of who could have the skill to steal the Heart of Venus.”

“I bet you stole it and you’re trying to take him for yourself!” Sara exclaimed.

“Well, if he falls for me, then it’s probably because I’m a mature woman who knows what she wants and you’re a growing girl who merely has a lot of money and power,” Rouge replied with a smirk.

Both Sara and Rouge began to glare at each other. You looked at your boss for help.

“Perhaps he can choose if he should be interrogated by Sara or Rouge,” Your boss happily said, getting both Sara and Rouge to glare at you.

‘Traitor!’ you thought.
151331121.title: You make it to the museum in one piece.

choices: You stick with questions and keep your distance
You decide to frisk her, but she flirts with you the whole time
She frisks you and 'finds' the Heart of Venus on you
1513311211.content:
As much as you wanted to pick Sara because she was pretty cute for a cat girl, her bodyguards were giving you nasty looks. Since they were gorillas and bears, you did not want to risk getting turned into a pretzel for one of Sara's flirting attempts.

"I guess I'll go with Rouge, though I have reservations about her being a part of the investigation team," You said, giving the Bat a glare.

Sara cutely pouted, even tearing up a bit. She pointed at Rouge and said, "If you do anything to him, I'll-I'll-"

"Throw me in prison? With how many times I helped defeat Dr. Eggman? That can be a PR nightmare for you," Rouge said as she looked at Sara and crossed her arms, making sure to emphasize her bosom.

Sara sputtered off in fury before stomping away.

"So where shall you interrogate me?" you asked with a frown.

When Rouge looked back at you, she said, "Anywhere you like. If you want, you can even frisk me, though I do ask to be able to frisk you back, hot stuff."

You blushed a little, as she was kind of hot, even if she was a thief. You answered, "Let's go to one of the storage rooms. There's some cameras there."

Rouge nodded as she said, "Lead away."

So as you led Rouge to one of the storage rooms, you said, "I know you stole the Heart of Venus. The lack of evidence points to it!"

"It can also point to Eggman reusing a plot of his, where he created a Robotic duplicate of me, ▼
http://sonic.wikia.com/wiki/Rogue_Rouge
, and stole a chaos emerald from the Smithsonian museum. Who knows what he could do with such a artifact?"

As the two of you entered a storage room, you glowered. You had heard of that event. 'If that's the case, then Rouge might be what we need to get back the heart. But if she is the thief, then we'd be barking up the wrong tree as the heart vanishes forever!'

"So... Shall I start with the questions and find out if you're innocent or not? I promise that for any question I ask, You'll be allowed to ask one as well," Rouge asked. As she made a sexy pose, she added, "Or shall we frisk each other and see if there's any weapons?"
1513311211.title: You pick Rouge

choices: ...The grand arcade on the other side of town!
1513311212.content:
Youre awful positive that crafty bat-girl may have something to do with the Heart of Venus being missing. If anyone you know of could be capable of making it disappear, it was her! Letting her pretend to interrogate you would more than likely get to the bottom of this mess!
However, Sara suddenly seems generous enough to forgive her prized possession being stolen after being introduced to you. And she's the daughter of the freaking President! And making friends with the daughter of the President no doubt has it's advantages. And keeping HER happy would keep your employment happy. And youre sorta holding back the urge to stroke that cute long cat-tail of hers. And there were plenty more upsides to this decision that it was take an entire CHAPTER to explain why this choice was a better idea!

"Um, with all due respect, Officer Topaz," you speak up, immediately causing Rouge and Sara to turn their heads to you, "while I do respect your authority and the authority of G.U.N.... I feel the lovely daughter of President Tammany holds higher authority, in my opinion. So I choose her to interrogate me."

"Hahaha!" upon hearing those words, Sara mockingly at Rouge and gave her with the most childish mocking smile.

"And just how exactly does she have higher authority than us?" the bat thief-pardon me, REFORMED bat thief objects, "she has no legal or judicial power whatsoever. Being Daddy's little girl doesnt really give her any of those privileges at all."
"It gives me the privilege of stealing your boytoy," you could overhear Sara sputter under her breath.

"Alright, if that's your decision," Topaz was willing to accept said decision, "Ms. Tammany, should you gain any information related to the burglary, do not hesitate to relay it to G.U.N. immediately."
"Dont worry," Sara smiled, "I wont leave out ANY details!" She winked over at Rouge when she said that.
With that, your fellow security crew sighed in relief as Mr. Huntersen pulled out a cigar about to light it. Too bad the museum director smacked it out of his hand!
"How many times have I told you not to smoke here?!" he stated.
"You said not to smoke while I'm on duty," Mr. Huntersen replied as he pulled out ANOTHER cigar, "I'm NOT." Like a boss. YOUR boss.

“Alright, let's get a move on, Mr…?”
“McWilliams” you answered Sara, “William McWilliams.” Yep.

“Alright, Will,” Sara smiled your way before turning her head to the director, “I'll be having Mr. McWilliams show me around your town. I trust you WILL begin searching for my precious Heart of Venus immediately, yes?”
The director nodded obediently, “At once Ms. Tammany! The police report is filed and I will spare no expense hiring the best detectives out there to track it down!”
“Good,” Sara was pleased by that answer, “now if you'll excuse us. Guys, properly escort Mr. McWilliams to my limo.” And right on command, three of Sara's body guards escort you.

“YAAGHH!”
And by 'escort' I mean they immediately grabbed you and bent your arms behind your back while gripping you by the neck and shoulders so you wouldnt budge as they DRAGGED you toward the limo! Rouge looked like she was about to step in, but Topaz stopped her.

“Dont move,” the bodyguard grabbing your neck whispered, “dont talk, dont blink, dont breathe, dont look at Ms. Tammany, dont even look at me.” You got tons of stares by everybody there. Especially Rouge who eyed you suspiciously the whole time. That gem thief left you feeling uneasy, but then again, being dragged off like a wanted fugitive left you feeling uneasy!

After the guards reached the Sara's personal limo, they crammed you in the back of it like it was a squad car. Speaking of, immediately after shoving you in there, they handcuffed you.
“You try to remove those, they will shock you,” warned one of the bodyguards right before slamming the door shut.

“Sorry about the rude welcoming,” Sara apologized with a smile, “high level security for a high level VIP. Cant be too careful what with daddy having way too many enemies that wanna sabotage his efforts to making the nation great again!”
You put on a forced smile and pretend the cuffs arent aching. “I-I-I understand. Guess it comes with the territory.” On the plus side, at least the limo's very comfy and luxurious. Aside from the surround speakers booming some boy band song at high volume on all sides of you, there's a little wine bar in the corner.

“Would you care for a drink?” she offers you, “I've got some of the finest imported champagne right here in this drawer.”
“No thanks,” you politely turn her down, despite possibly NEEDING it, “I'm not a drinker.”
“Neither am I, I hate the stuff!” she was awful quick to chuck a bottle out the window! “it's finally nice to see a professional well trained officer that actually resists the horrible habit that comes from alcohol.” Well, youre not exactly an 'officer', but you dont object to the title she's giving you. “I cant say I've seen you at the museum before. I'd remember being properly introduced to you.”
“Well, I've only been working there for a few weeks,” you answer, “I'm still getting used to it.”
“A few weeks?!” Sara seemed a bit offended, “and they never bothered to tell me?! Hmph. First they somehow lose my precious Heart of Venus, now they dont even have the common courtesy to alert me of new staff so I can properly welcome them in private?!” Was that really her business? Not that youre arguing, of course! “Well, I'm gonna have a word with your superiors much later.”

“Please dont, Ms. Tammany,” you pleaded with her, “theyre really good staff! I probably wouldnt be half as good a security guard if not for their training.”
She raised an eyebrow and curled her lip, pretending to give it some thought, “Well… I suppose I'll let it slide. Surely, it's their training that'll get my Heart of Venus back.” So far so good. As long as Sara's in good temper, your crew and your career are gonna be just fine. Thinking back to your training on dealing with distraught high-level clients, one rule you remember is to keep them talking. Find out their interest and be interested!

"Say, I've been curious about something."

"Curious about what?" Sara's cat-ears twitched, ready to hear it.

"That Heart of Venus," you say, "well, I only learned a little bit of info from it, but I never had to time to properly research it. I mean where did it come from?"
"I'm so glad you asked!" score! "It was actually a gift that daddy got me as a high school graduation present. Back when he had his old job, he discovered it during a dig at an archeological summit in Cyprus. He said it was found under the ruins of a grand hotel in Varosha."
And that was the part where you got interested.

"Wait, Varosha?" the name peeked your interest, "isnt that that one city that got completely abandoned in the 70s?"
"Why yes it is," she nodded, "it's a real shame, too. It couldve made a real luxurious resort from the family business. Not to mention, lots and lots of priceless artifacts were sitting right there under the ground beneath it. Raging from ancient Greek, Roman, a few Persian things... they even found remnants of an ancient holy blade that King Richard may have used during the Third Crusade!" HOLY SHI-no, better not. Very improper. Still, that's incredible knowledge for you!

"Wow!" you couldnt help but be swept away by such sheer epicness, "all that in one abandoned city?!"
"Yep," she said with a smug prideful expression.
"Do you think there still might be more stuff like that over in Varosha?"
"Most likely," she said. WHELP. Now you know where YOURE going on your vacation! Youre getting yourself a holy sword!

"Oh dear, look at me going on and on," Sara sighed, "I'm sorry to bore you with that anecdote."
"You didnt bore me at all," you said with stars still in your eyes.
"It's still early in the day," she changes the subject, "I feel like checking out what this city has to offer. Hey Will, youre from here arent you? Surely you know all the sights to see. Is there anywhere nearby that's worth seeing?" Ok, now it was time for YOU to peek HER interest. The fate of your source of employment and future career may very well rest on your attempt to excite her. Best not screw it up!

You think for a moment of a good place and decide...
1513311212.title: My Date With The President's Daughter

choices: Sara came back with the food and drinks.
Robots appeared and tried to kidnap Sara! What will you do?!
15133112121.content:
Merely looking outside the window gave you an idea. You said, "Well, what about a trip to that mall?"

You swore her eyes widened and sparkled, making you wonder if you made a misake, a horrible mistake.

Looking ahead, you thought you saw the driver shake like he was laughing like a maniac.

"Great idea!" Sara said as she hug-tackled you.

===

Barely 30 minutes later, you were regretting even seeing the president's daughter.

"I should've called in sick..." you muttered. Your arms were barely lifting the multitude of bags. She even bought some weird backpack that allowed her to hang more bags on your back. All of which was clothes, shoes, and video games.

"This trip is going great!" Sara said before her stomach growled. She looked back at you and innocently asked, "Are you hungry? I could go for some pizza..."

"...y ...Yeah..." you uttered, wondering if you were going to be crushed by clothes.

Within a few minutes, you sat down at a table, grateful for the relief.

"I'll go order!" Sara cheerfully said as she leaned over you, trying to show off her body. "Whatcha want me to get?"

"Eh... I'll stick with regular cheese pizza and I'd be grateful to get some cola," you answered.

"Great choice! I'll get the same!" Sara said before she leaned in and kissed your forehead. To your delight, she briefly brushed her tail against your hand.

As she skipped to a pizza stand, you smiled a little bit as you said, "Her tail felt.... nice."
15133112121.title: taking a catgirl to the huge mall nearby!

151331121212.content:
Suddenly, the nice pleasant jazzy music playing on the speakers all across the mall suddenly cut off and was immediately replaced with a loud hiss followed by some white noise! It was the first sign that something very bad was off.

The next sign came random screams in the crowd! Then more screams. Then screams followed by 'beep beep boop's and a monotone 'TARGET ACQUIRED: COMMENCE APPREHENSION!' And that's when you see the robots storm the place yet AGAIN.
Yes, again. This isnt the first time your town was attacked by robots. You kinda lost count after the 48th. But as usual, SOME maniacal evil geniuses with the capability to create doomsday machines just dont know when to give up. One in particular, considering dang near every single one of the robot invaders have his patented trademarked cartoony face imprinted on them!

However, it couldnt have been Dr. Eggman, he's still locked up in Helheim, a top profile maximum security prison island that since it's founding over half a century ago has NEVER had a successful prison break! So if it aint HIM, there's only one other evil genius that has the brains and the know-how to commandeer the Eggman Empire!

*Tap tap tap* "Ahem!" said her voice on the speakers, "attention all shoppers. This mall and everything and everyone inside is now in the custody of the Eggman Empire! Because your stupid local police force, your stupid lawmakers, and your even stupider elected bureaucrats have decided to deny Uncle Eggman's rightfully deserved parole, it is within the Eggman Empire's rightful power to hold every one of you stupid citizens responsible and hold you hostage until proper negotiations have concluded!"

You groaned hard and brushed hard through your hair as the screams for help were all around you. And even worse, that thing your boss said about Sara's screams?

"EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEKKKKKKKKKKK!!"

He was right.
So you got up out of your seat, wiped the blood from your ears, and began your trek.

"Do not attempt to flee or resist apprehension," warned the voice on the speakers, "excessive force will be used should you fail to comply and... huh? ...NO WAY!! ...FOR REAL?!!! AW SWEET!!! HAHAHA!! We got the prez's stupid little girl as a bargaining chip!!! Uncle's gonna be so proud!!"

Sounds like she knew they nabbed Sara. Better head to her quickly and sort this out before that eggheaded nimrod does something she'll later regret!
"Hey Butl3r," you greet the tall fancy dressed blue haired metallic skinned butler currently holding his katana to a security guard's throat.
"Good day to you, Mr. McWilliams," he politely addresses you as he's still gripping his blade firmly to the neck of his hostage.
"I need to speak to Omelette," you tell him, "where is she?"
"Ms. Omelette is currently occupying the security station," Butl3r answers, "it should be through the tight pathway just before the Sbarros."
"Got it! Thanks Butl3r!"
"Pleasure is all mine, Mr. McW-please refrain from hyperventilating less your windpipe will be severed."

Wasting no time, you make a mad dash to the Sbarros, zip through the pathway before it, follow the signs and lines of robo-slaves patrolling the area. Anyone else rushing to the security station, they wouldve dogpiled them and prevented any and all effort of anybody reaching their boss, but not you. They let you pass. They knew you were their boss's only special exception.
You make record time reaching the main computer room that the evil genius herself was sitting in, broadcasting her blackmail on the speakers!

The feisty spikey brunette woman in a dress with the same yellow, black, and red color scheme... just like her uncle.
Sporting her big thick cokebottle shades... just like her uncle.
Wearing a yellow hairband with a red ruby jewel in her hair.... er, NOT like her uncle... BUT giving off her fierce and cocky demeanor as she spoke in the mic and ending her speech with an evil "OHOHOHOHOHO!"... JUST LIKE HER UNCLE!

Omelette. Dr. Ivo 'Eggman' Robotnik's darling niece... and your old childhood friend. ....It's kind of a long story. Let's just say your mother had a very rough past and made the wrong kind of friends, but in the end it still had it's advantages!

Anyways, you kick through the door ready to confront your old pal for the 839th time!

Omelette sighed and turned hear head, "About time you got back! How did it take so long for you to get me a stupid corndo-?!!!!" Her eyes immediately widened under her shades as soon as she saw you, "Wha... W-Will?! What are you doing here?!"
"That's MY line, Omelette!" you snapped at her, "what in the world do you think youre doing NOW?!"
She growled, "Grr!! What does it look like I'm doing?! I'm trying my absolute hardest to get my uncle out of prison!"

You facepalmed. Like you always do. "Omelette, you know this isnt gonna work, right? If you want to help him out, TERRORISM ISNT THE WAY TO GO!"
"But the stupid state promised my uncle parole!!" she whined, "they made a stupid deal! He served the stupid time! He paid the stupid fines! He performed the stupid community service! And they STILL denied him parole!!"
"So you think the best course of action is to just randomly kidnap hundreds of innocent people who have nothing to do with your problem and use them as extortion?!"
"OF COURSE!!!" she stamps with her arms to her sides straight as a plank, "see how the stupid president feels when HIS stupid loved one is held up like a prisoner!"

"Omelette!!" you give her that tone again, "for the last time, you need to cut this out! You have to face the fact that your uncle is in prison for a good reason. You wanna take over the world, the world doesnt wanna be taken over, THAT'S what happens to you!"
As usual, Omelette's angry expression quickly turns to sadness, like she's moments away from crying!
"B....But Will! How would YOU feel if they locked up your mom?! You cant possibly tell me that if she were an evil super genius like Uncle Eggman was that YOU wouldnt do the same!!"
You inhaled and exhale and softened your tone, "Well... I guess if I knew the kinds of things you did, I'd probably think of doing the same. But I know mom wouldnt want me throw my life away doing this. And I know your uncle wouldnt want you to throw your life away doing this."

She didnt reply to that. She just stared back into your eyes silently staring. You could only imagine the kinds of thoughts that were rushing into her head that moment. But you didnt wanna push her. You could only reason with her.

"C'mon Omelette," you plead with her, "let Sara go. Let everybody in the mall go."

She stared and stared. It seemed like hours passed waiting for her to stop staring at you and silence and finally respond to you. But you let her take her time.

After what seemed like an extremely long time later, Omelette...
151331121212.title: We Dont Always Pick the Best Friends....

choices: You accepted her offer. She had a motorcycle
you accepted her offer. She had a car that looked really high-tech
151331122.content:
Your car made the tell-tale sound of it trying to start... and failing.

"C'mon... C'mon... Please start. I know the president's daughter is going to ream me out, simply for being a security guard..." You grumbled.

Eventually, you gave up and banged your head against the steering wheel. You muttered, "And there probably goes my job..."

You heard a knock on the door. Looking up, you saw Rouge the Bat.

"Heard your car give its death whines. Need a ride somewhere?" The bat asked.

You did your best not to, but you glared a bit at her.

On one hand, she was a notorious thief for anything gem, jewel, or crystal-related matters. You heard many tales about her being able to steal something, even if it was watched.

On the other hand, she was involved with saving the world more than a handful of times and she was kinda hot for a bat lady.

The mixed bag you had about her was that because she saved the world a few times, she had her prior criminal history erased. and you heard rumors that she still stole but was keeping it really quiet now, though

You asked, "What's the cost?"

"Nothing, handsome. Maybe a chat or a date. Something about you intrigues me," Rouge answered.
151331122.title: Your car wont start. Somebody tampered with it!

choices: ...screaming in your face over how incompetant you are.
...displaying tons of sympathy for your hospitalized father.
...demanding she speak with you AND ONLY YOU in private.
1513311222.content:
You knew better than to trust a 'reformed' criminal who isnt technically reformed. But you were too desperate to trust your gut. A major dilemma of NATIONAL proportion has occurred in your place of work and if you arrive late, the dilemma could end up getting much worse. And being fired may be the LEAST to worry about!

You squinted your eyes as the bat who was smirking back at you. Maybe she knew you were desperate and could tell right away you werent gonna refuse her 'generous' offer.

You sighed and caved. "Alright. Where's your ride?"
"Right over there," she pointed over to the wicked stylish painted white GP motorcycle that obviously wasnt intended for driving on the street or highway with a picture of a cool bat logo and the word 'ROUGE' written in purple feminine cursive. You were no fan of riding motorcycles. The thought of gripping one of those for dear life going 80+mph with G-force hitting your face and the wind wrecking your eardrums made you feel uneasy.

"She's pretty, isnt she?" Rouge asks, noticing the tense stare you were giving her ride, "she's not only gorgeous, she's faster than lightning. She'll go 0-60 in less than 3 seconds. But dont worry. Her seats are extra cozy so you wont get a rash."
You swallowed hard as the bat mounted her beloved bike and patted the cushion behind her. "Dont keep her waiting, hop on!"
Ignoring the voices in your head telling you not to, you jumped on the bike and scooted up close against Rouge, trying extra careful not to pitch a tent! Sadly, the seductive tone in her voice, the pleasant smell of her perfume, the warm feel of her gentle skin, and the adrenaline rush from the inevitable fast and incredibly dangerous ride was making it easier said than done!

"D-Do you have an extra helmet?" you asked just as she turned over the engine.
"Nope!" she answered as she revved, "youre just gonna have to hold on tight!"

"JEEZZZ!!" she had to scare the beejeezuz out of you by popping a wheelie just before zipping down the street!

Gritting your teeth and holding back the urge to scream, you rushed down the freeway at tip top speed, gripping as tightly as you can to the bat girl in a desperate attempt not to fly off the bike! You lost count of the number of cars you passed constantly switching lanes back and forth, outrunning the cars privileged enough to use the carpool lane! You dare not count the number of times Rouge came so close to ramming into the cars in front of her just before zipping out of the lane at the last second! Really pissed off loads of drivers. Tons of honking and screaming and a few threats. She even intentionally revved her engine up close to the ears of whom you believe was the driver of a Triad car, spooking the hell out of her. You'll never forget her threat in broken english saying “If I catch you, I carve off your fucking nutsack and make nice new handbag for sister!”

Actually what felt like eternity despite only minutes passing, Rouge exists the freeway and speeds off toward the museum in record time. Good news is that you werent late. Bad news is, actually you kinda were. Several black cars and a news crew were parked outside. Not a good sign. The motorcycle ride comes to a stop.
“Here we are!” Rouge announces as you hop off the right. Youre still a little dizzy and your ears were ringing and the thoughts of having your nutsack carved into a handbag still flooded your mind, but youre fine.
“Thanks a lot,” you sighed, “I owe you one.”
She smirked and winked, “Yes you do… but we'll discuss the payment plan next time. Good luck!” With one more eardrum shattering revv of the engine, she sped out into the distance and in the blink of an eye she was gone. You know you havent seen the last of her. You'll be lucky if you've seen the last of that Triad driver!

Pushing that scenario aside, you march your ass toward the side of the building away from all the commotion and meet up with the chief of security who was currently smoking a cigarette with impatience as loud unintelligible high-pitched screaming could be heard from the inside.

“Took you long enough,” Mr. Huntersen looks your way and tosses his cigarette.
“Sorry, boss. My car broke down and I had to bum a ride-”
“Yeah yeah yeah yeah,” he cuts you off, “just get inside and get ready.” The two of you stepped inside just in time to see every single employee, security guard, and even a few investors lined up in single file as a cat girl in a fancy executive dress march up and down the row chewing them out!
“Not even one week! NOT EVEN ONE WHOLE WEEK!” repeats Sara, the daughter of our beloved leader, President Tammany, “How does that possibly happen?! I once kept it sitting in my purse for almost a month and nothing ever happened to it! This museum has it locked up tight behind bullet-proof glass and air tight security and it just vanishes in a couple of days?!”
“You have our most sincere apologies, Ms. Tammany,” the Director grovels, “we cant possibly fathom how the Heart of Venus could just slip out of our fingers after all the expenses we made to ensure it's safety!”
“Cant fathom it, huh?” Sara sneered, “because I can fathom at least a dozen ways a museum like this one can somehow lose a prized priceless historical artifact! Helga, if you were me, would you continue investing in a museum like this one if it up and lost your most beloved treasure in a matter of days?”
“Tsk, I wouldnt,” answered Helga, Sara's personal bodyguard.

And in perfect timing, Sara's eyes turned to yours. Then Helga's eyes turned to yours. Then EVERYBODY'S eyes turned to yours!

“Who is he?” Sara asked the staff.
“Will McMaster, ma'am,” you introduce yourself, “I work security night shift when a new exhibit is introduced.”
Sara looked at her watch then to you, “Why are you so late? I told this museum I wanted EVERYONE who's a part of this place to show up here before I did!”
“I'm sorry, ma'am,” you apologized as she marched your way, “my car suddenly broke down and I had to hitch a ride with a fri-an acquaintance.” Her eyes continued locking on toward yours as she got closer, “Uh… um, a-anyway, I was assigned to watch the Heart of Venus during my night shift for the past few days,” you explain as she continued toward, her stare getting more and more intense, “h-however, I wasnt working the shift the night the Heart of Venus disappeared. I...” geez that stare of hers! “I-I-I had to take the night off because of a f-family emergency. Had to visit my dad at the hospital. H-he got in an accident in his pickup. H-he's fine, just a couple of leg cuts and scrapes. The pickup was totalled though.” She finally stopped her march, but only after her pearly aqua-colored eyes were inches away from yours! “A-A-A-ANYWAY, I wasnt here during the robbery, so I couldnt witness it.”

God, must Sara be so pin-drop silent? It's really creeping you out!
Unfortunately, she DOES finally break the silence after almost a whole minute by...
1513311222.title: I am Alive & Amplified

choices: You were friends with Vanilla the Rabbit
Sara and Rouge decide to share you
15133112221.content:
"You big incompetent jerk! You should have been here and stopped the thief!" Sara yelled. "But no! The very museum I allowed to show off the Heart of Venus has this dummy not even bothering to make sure they had a replacement!"

"Hey, kitty cat. He apologized and said he had to take time off to make sure his dad was safe," Rouge said, looking a little upset. "After all, you'd take time off to make sure your dad is safe from an accident, right, you little daddy's girl?"

"Rouge!" A police officer named Topaz grunted.

Sara glared at Rouge and hissed, "Don't you dare bring up my dad. He's president and your boss!"
